description: This file defines an Angular service called ApiService that wraps the HttpClient for making HTTP requests. It centralizes the base URL configuration from environment variables and provides methods for GET and POST requests with integrated error handling.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: An Angular service that provides simplified HTTP methods with centralized base URL and error handling.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the backend API, appending the given path to the base URL, with optional headers, and applies error handling.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the backend API with the specified path, body, and optional headers, including error handling.

methods.name: handleError
methods.description: Handles HTTP errors by logging to console and rethrowing the error observable.
